body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joshua Rogers and the customer's name is Lauren Walker.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joshua Rogers, and I’m with MetaCar, a leading car rental agency. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Joshua, I'm Lauren Walker. I'm feeling quite frustrated with my recent experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Lauren. Your satisfaction is very important to us. Can you please tell me what specific issue you've encountered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I booked a car, but it wasn’t ready when I arrived at the location.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds very inconvenient, and I understand your frustration. Can I have your booking reference number so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! It’s eight three seven two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Lauren. I appreciate that. Can I also have your phone number to connect with you for updates?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s two zero two five six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I see your booking now. Let me check on the car's status immediately.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I just want to make sure I can get my rental as planned.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Lauren. I’ll fast-track this and ensure you have your rental car shortly. Thank you for your patience!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Joshua. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, and I hope you have a wonderful day!
